results.title: The Sunshine boys
results.creator_credit: Herbert Ross, Ray Stark and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Adapted from the play by Neil Simon, this film version stars two great actors, Walter Matthau and George Burns, as the two cantankerous old-time vaudevillians who have been persuaded to reunite one more time for a television special, despite the fact that they hate each other. Also stars Richard Benjamin.

results.title: Dogpound shuffle
results.brief_description: A tender tale about two lonely wanderers, ex-vaudevillian dancer Steps (Ron Moody) and the drifting Pritt (David Soul) who goes wherever the odd job will take him. Steps is on the road looking for his missing beloved friend, Spot the dancing dog, when he first encounters Pritt. The two strike up a friendship and find themselves in a series of misadventures as they hit the road to find the missing Spot. A story for the family - one with a happy ending.

results.title: Rigoletto
results.creator_credit: Carmine Gallone, Giulio Fiaschi, Excelsa Film and Grandi Film Storici
results.brief_description: Film version of Giuseppe Verdi’s tragic opera Rigoletto shot at the Teatro Dell’opera, Rome. This tale of revenge, rape and murder stars the highly acclaimed singer, Tito Gobbi in the role of Rigoletto supported by Mario Filippesche (Duke of Mantua), Anna Maria Canali (Maddalena) and Marcella Govoni acting in the role of Gilda with Lina Pagliughi singing the role of Gilda. Features the Chorus and Orchestra of Teatro Dell’opera, Rome, conducted by Tullio Serafin. Sung in Italian.

results.title: Air Force One
results.creator_credit: Wolfgang Petersen, Armyan Bernstein, Gail Katz, Jonathan Shestack and Buena Vista International
results.brief_description: Cementing his status as action hero leading man, Harrison Ford plays the United States President who also happens to be a Vietnam War hero. Trapped aboard his private jet, President Marshall must display a steely reserve in the face of unhinged kidnappers. Peterson (In the Line of Fire, The Perfect Storm, Troy) ably directs this mainstream thriller that produces a tangle of twists but lacks the enormous tension generated by his classic wartime nail-biter “Das Boot”. Cast also includes Gary Oldman, Wendy Crewson, Paul Guilfoyle, Glenn Close, Dean Stockwell, William H. Macy.

results.title: Betsy's wedding
results.creator_credit: Alan Alda, Louis A. Stroller, Martin Bregman and Touchstone Pictures
results.brief_description: Directed by Alan Alda, “Betsy’s wedding” is about a father (Alda) who must survive his daughter’s wedding, with all its fractious factions, complications, cost, deal making and emotional turmoil. An intermittently amusing work, with the highlight being Anthony La Paglia’s turn as a mobster’s nephew who falls for the bride’s policewoman sister. Cast also includes Joey Bishop, madeline Kahn, Molly Ringwald, Joe Pesci, Ally Sheedy.

results.title: Bye bye Birdie
results.creator_credit: George Sidney, Fred Kohlmar, Columbia Pictures and Kohlmar-Sidney Productions
results.brief_description: When a singer is drafted, a songwriter and his girlfriend decide to capitalize on the event. On national TV, Conrad Birdie will sing a song to a lucky teenager. Cast includes Janet Leigh, Dick Van Dyke, Ann-Margret, Maureen Stapleton, Bobby Rydell, Jesse Pearson and Ed Sullivan as himself. Based upon the play “Bye, bye, Birdie”, book by Michael Stewart with music and lyrics by Charles Strouse and Lee Adams.

results.title: Dancers
results.creator_credit: Herbert Ross, Menahem Golan, Yoram Globus, Baryshnikov Productions, Golan-Globus and Hera Productions
results.brief_description: Mikhail Baryshnikov, one of the world’s greatest and most admired ballet dancers stars in this romantic drama about an American ballet company’s arrival in Italy to perform the romantic ballet ‘Giselle’. Baryshnikov plays Tony (Anton) Sergeyev, lead dancer and director of the production, ladies’ man, experienced and charming who finds himself attracted to the newest member of his troupe, the young and naive American teenager Lisa (Julie Kent). Art begins to mirror life as the drama of love and betrayal of ‘Giselle’ is played out backstage between Tony and Lisa. Features the dancers of the American Ballet Theater, Allesandra Ferri (Francesca), Leslie Browne (Nadine) and Mariangela Melato (the Contessa). ‘Giselle’ is conducted by Michael Tilson Thomas and performed by the London Symphony Orchestra, original music by Pino Donaggio.

results.title: The Children of Theatre Street
results.creator_credit: Earle Mack, Robert Dornhelm and Kultur International Films
results.brief_description: Describes life at the Vaganova Choreographic Institute in Leningrad (also known as the Kirov School of Leningrad), formerly the Imperial Ballet School of Russia, which has spawned dancers like Nureyev, Pavlova, Nijinsky, Baryshnikov, and Balanchine. Here at the school, gifted students are trained in classical ballet, using methods that have much in common with the training of ballet students anywhere in the world. Narrated by Princess Grace of Monaco and features Galina Messenzeva and Konstantine Zaklinsky of the Kirov Ballet. Ballet performances filmed and recorded live at the Kirov, Bolshoi and Maly Theatres, USSR.

results.title: White nights
results.creator_credit: Taylor Hackford, William S. Gilmore, Columbia Pictures, Delphi V Productions and New Visions Pictures
results.brief_description: This Cold War thriller stars real-life dancer Mikhail Baryshnikov as a Russian defector who finds himself trapped in his homeland when his plane crashes in Siberia. Billeted with an American dancer (Gregory Hines), Kolya is desperate to escape and hatches a daring plan but must evade the keen attentions of the KGB. Whilst the plot is fair to middling, the dancing in this feature film is brilliant, making the most of the two lead’s spectacular talents. Also stars Helen Mirren and Isabella Rossellini.

results.title: Armageddon
results.creator_credit: Michael Bay, Jerry Bruckheimer and Touchstone Pictures
results.brief_description: Big budget sci-fiction thriller from director Michael Bay is nothing less than a glorious onslaught of thrills, explosions and entirely employable, if increasingly unlikely, scenarios. Negative reviews (deriding its extravagance and silliness) did nothing to dent its box office haul. Cast includes Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Liv Tyler, Ben Affleck, Will Patton, Owen Wilson, Steve Buscemi, Owen Wilson, Peter Stormare.
